attributes.review: I do not like this app. I did not want to receive texts or anything from this app, but it literally would not let me press “I do not accept”. I think it’s stupid that you HAVE to give the app permission to send you texts and emails in order to use the app.
attributes.title: ✨ NOPE ✨

attributes.review: shooting myself in the foot 6 times and rubbing dirt in my wounds would be far more pleasurable than opening this app again. Thanks to Trump’s horrible face I have had night terrors ever since downloading this. less than one star from me!!!
attributes.title: This app is trash

attributes.review: Was soo disappointed with this app😠There were zero ompa loompas ZERO!!! I had HUUGE expectations but was greatly let down. Very disorganized and cluttered very very confusing. Not very entertaining just a bit sad and pathetic, kinda like Trump. Anyway I will be deleting this miserable excuse for an app. I expected better Donny *sigh*
attributes.title: Hoooorible

attributes.review: Waited forever to download this app for it to crash. I saw the other comments and thought it was just their phone but my phone has never had a problem. This app is awful 😡
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time

attributes.review:
Made my phone crash the moment the download completed. I thought it was a glitch and waited a while but it kept on happening throughout the day. 
Horrible and annoying!!!!
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Honestly the worst working app on my phone. Took forever to open up and just kept glitching back to my home screen?? Very unprofessional. Sad. Huge disappointment. Expected it to have even the bare minimum for an app, and it doesn’t.
attributes.title: Sad

attributes.review: Um, first off the app crashed really bad once I clicked on it, then it stole all my data and apps I was like 😱😱 and then it turned off my phone and didn’t turn back on until like 10 minutes after, horrible app!!
attributes.title: 😞 don’t claim!!

attributes.review: ⚠️⚠️⚠️This app is extremely buggy and keeps making my phone crash‼️ 🤬DO NOT DOWNLOAD‼️🤬It will give your phone a virus and it takes up soooo much storage‼️This is the worst app i’ve ever had i absolutely hate it and will never download again⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: This app is awful!!! I got hacked within two days of having this app!! It sent me to a child pornography site!!! It didn’t give me any information about the election and instead sent me to some illegal websites. The App Store needs to remove this asap!!!
attributes.title: CHILD PORNOGRAPHY

attributes.review: Went into downloading this thinking it would be kind of like Sims. It was not like Sims 😔 instead I was bombarded with the kind of advertisements that only people who prefer the Star Wars prequels movies to the originals would make
attributes.title: Disappointed
